panels.description:
tubes -  the number of currently-existing tubes

producers - the number of open connections that have each issued at least one put command

workers - the number of open connections that have each issued at least one reserve command

waiting - the number of open connections that have issued a reserve command but not yet received a response
panels.title: Number of tubes/producers/workers/waiting

panels.description: Cumulative count of jobs created in all tubes after restart beanstalkd process  in rate of range 1 minutes
panels.title: Job Total

panels.description: Current number jobs in different state
panels.title: Jobs count
Tube total jobs count - absolute value

panels.description: Tube total jobs in rate of range 1 minutes
panels.title: Tube total jobs count
Tube current jobs READY - absolute value
Tube current jobs RESERVED - absolute value
Tube current jobs DELAYED - absolute value
Tube current jobs BURIED - absolute value
Tube current jobs URGENT - absolute value

panels.description: Total  count of connections in rate of range 1 minutes
panels.title: Total connections

panels.description: Index of the current binlog file
panels.title: Binlog current index

panels.description: The index of the oldest binlog file needed to store the current jobs
panels.title: Binlog oldest index

panels.description: The maximum size in bytes a binlog file is allowed to get before a new binlog file is opened
panels.title: Binlog max size

panels.description: the cumulative number of records written to the binlog
panels.title: Binlog records written - absolute value

panels.description: the  number of records written to the binlog in rate of  range 1 minutes
panels.title: Binlog records written

panels.description: The cumulative number of records written as part of compaction
panels.title: Binlog records migrated
